title: Brisbane Classes Available for Booking
summary: Our Bob Ross painting classes are available for booking again from August through November in Brisbane. Never painted before? No problem. Bring some friends and have some fun learning to paint in Bob's original method. Everyone can do it. Head over to arthoughts.com to reserve a spot.
author: Maaret Webb

summary: How I paint my Daily Bobs when I travel and get them home without smudges...easy to stack the wet paintings on top of each other and put a clean one on top. üòÅ
author: Maaret Webb

title: Series 12 episode 4
summary:
Used the corner of the two inch and one inch brush for all the foliage in this one. Nice trick Bob..love those big brushes..so versatile.
    Also used Archival‚Äôs alkyd medium to thin the paint for highlights and branches..it‚Äôs fantastic...a safe and hassle-free allrounder that I‚Äôm substituting from now on for Bob‚Äôs liquid clear and thinners..ditching those horrors forever.
    And it‚Äôs made in Australia! üòä‚ù§Ô∏è
    Series 12 episode 4
    10‚Äùx12‚Äù
    Oil on canvas
author: Maaret Webb

title: Series 12 Episode 3
summary:
Enjoyed painting the mountains in this one..the little changes, like throwing the light from the left, the grassy areas at the base. I was a bit impatient following Bob in the video, so after painting the highlights on the mountains I finished it off using the image in the instruction manual. Could also be fun to first watch the video, then paint it from memory!
    Series 12 Episode 3
    10‚Äùx12‚Äù
    Oil on canvas
author: Maaret Webb

title: Yesterday‚Äôs class gems...
summary:
Yesterday‚Äôs class gems blew my mind how well the paintings turned out.
    I‚Äôve put each of their paintings below..have a peek..
content: absolutely amazing! Sure do enjoy this gig, especially on days like this. These girls get what Bob is about, are loads of fun to be around and a dream to teach. ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è
author: Maaret Webb

title: Second Trial Run
summary: Second trial run...easier to teach now I think. Will be an interesting class tomorrow, very talented fun girls who get what Bob is about..we‚Äôll make up stories about the barn..today it became a barn conversion/summer getaway for me...in Finland...the sauna is tucked away behind the trees, right on the water. Hubby and I have gone berry picking..we found a wild strawberry patch. üçì üçì üçì
author: Maaret Webb

title: Trial Painting for Upcoming Class
summary: Trial run for my next class...have to dig into my bag of tricks for this one, to make it manageable for my students. There are so many layers of paint in the lower half..ends up too gluggy, for me anyway. Going to try something different before Saturday..apply liquid white only to the top half of the canvas..the sky and water areas..then use straight dark paint on the bottom half, on dry canvas, before adding the highlights and other features. I‚Äôll still be painting wet in wet, but hopefully not mud into mud. üòÇ
author: Maaret Webb

title: Classes Still Running For the Time Being
summary:
I‚Äôve limited the numbers for GOld Coast classes to no more than 3...Brissie studio still fine for the maximum number of 9..more than enough space to keep a safe distance. I‚Äôll keep teaching for as long as I can, not cancelling classes unless necessary.
    I am looking forward to starting my daily Bob‚Äôs again..life sure has gotten in the way..for a few months now. Happy painting friends and let‚Äôs stay connected. ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è
author: Maaret Webb

author: Maaret Webb

title: Event: Mo's Desert Clubhouse
summary: Another great night at Mo‚Äôs desert clubhouse.
content: Another great night at Mo‚Äôs desert clubhouse. Painting along to Bob‚Äôs episode ‚ÄúEvergreens at Sunset‚Äù projected onto a massive wall sized screen, in real time, 27 minutes, as part of the Bob Ross Challenge that is taking the world by storm..even reaching all the way down here! Enjoyed this night even more than the last one, maybe maybe because I didn‚Äôt do my talk and demonstration on stage, but down near the bar, where everybody else was hanging out. MOs makes the BEST sangria..and it‚Äôs on tap. üòÅ ü•¥ .
author: Maaret Webb

title: Event: Bob Ross Challenge
summary: Hey, to anyone in the Gold Coast area on Thursday March 12th, come join me at Mo‚Äôs Desert Clubhouse in Burleigh Heads for the next Bob Ross challenge...
content: Hey, to anyone in the Gold Coast area on Thursday March 12th, come join me at Mo‚Äôs Desert Clubhouse in Burleigh Heads for the next Bob Ross challenge...it‚Äôs a lot of fun painting along with Bob to one of his tv episodes in real time...see if you can keep up with the boss. Drinks and nibblies available. Tickets from mosdesertclubhouse.com I‚Äôll be there from 6:30pm onwards.
author: Maaret Webb

title: Mountain Splendour
summary: Teaching this at my next class..Mountain Splendour. I‚Äôve learnt to appreciate Indian Yellow with this one..works beautifully in Autumn/Fall paintings.
content:
Teaching this at my next class..Mountain Splendour. I‚Äôve learnt to appreciate Indian Yellow with this one..works beautifully in Autumn/Fall paintings. Bob‚Äôs approach to mountains here is rather tricky though, so I‚Äôve simplified it for my students.

He spent a long time on the mountains, almost two thirds of the episode, and seems rushed towards the end with not enough time left to sign his name. But once again he pulls it off with a gorgeous end result. Quite incredible if you really think about it...Bob never once went over the time limit and every episode we see was unedited. Real deal, no smoke and mirrors.
author: Maaret Webb

title: Group Photos
summary: Bob Ross workshop group photos
author: Maaret Webb

title: Series 11
summary: Series 11...so far I‚Äôm not a fan. Bob experiments more in this series with liquid clear, which I find tricky and unpredictable.
content:
Series 11...so far I‚Äôm not a fan. Bob experiments more in this series with liquid clear, which I find tricky and unpredictable. This week I‚Äôm back into painting these smaller ones...been far too distracted for a few weeks now.

Decided to find one thing I like about this one and ignore what bugs me..I like the use of mostly blue in the background, and how it connects seamlessly with the blue of the water. Clever Bob..nice move.
author: Maaret Webb

title: Lazy River Practice
content: Practice pieces for class..did 4 in total. I‚Äô m teaching it because some students want to paint scenes they can relate to here in Australia and this one comes close I‚Äô ve been told, even without gum trees.They'll be coming soon though..seen some fabulous paperbarks nearby..a whole street lined with them!
author: Maaret Webb

title: HOW TO BE A BOB ROSS HAPPY LITTLE TREE. üå≤üå≤üå≤üòÅüòÅüòÅ
content:
1. There's no such thing as a mistake
  2. Put happy things into your world.
  3. Everyone has a story
  4. It's ok to be different
  5. Believe in yourself
  6. Do what makes you happy.
  7. Everything gets easier with practice.
  8. Beauty is everywhere
author: Maaret Webb

title: Lazy River
summary: Finally worked out a straightforward way to teach this at my next workshop..Bob painted this one early on in the series..in season 2...and following his process wouldn‚Äôt work with students who‚Äôve never painted before.
content:
Finally worked out a straightforward way to teach this at my next workshop..Bob painted this one early on in the series..in season 2...and following his process wouldn‚Äôt work with students who‚Äôve never painted before.

E.g. he uses a special paint gun that he‚Äôd invented and patented for the thinnest branches on the trees..but it didn‚Äôt go into production because it wasn‚Äôt cost effective. Interesting bit of trivia, yes? This is my 3rd attempt..tomorrow I‚Äôll paint a final one to use in class.
author: Maaret Webb

title: Introducing Gold Coast Workshops
summary: Introducing Gold Coast Workshops
content:
Starting next month, our Bob Ross workshops will also be held at our studio in Burleigh Heads on the Gold Coast. Continue reading for more details, or head over to arthoughts.com for bookings

These classes will be held on the 3rd Saturday of each month, and will be covering some of Bob‚Äôs more simple designs on a smaller canvas, and will run for 3 hours.

Like the workshops in Brisbane, they‚Äôre suitable for any skill level, but are the perfect introduction for beginners to Bob‚Äôs method. Check out the website
author: Maaret Webb

title: Series 10 Complete
summary: Finished season 10 of the Joy of Painitng with this one..yippee..next big milestone I‚Äôm aiming to reach will be season 15‚Ä¶I‚Äôll be halfway then to my final goal‚Ä¶Daily Bobs done and dusted!
author: Maaret Webb

title: A Little Inspiration
summary: First daily Bob of the year‚Ä¶
content:
It was painted yesterday on our home balcony. There are days when I can‚Äôt make it to the studio..life happens..so I keep a painting kit at home in one of those big plastic storage containers from a hardware store. It fits nicely into a wardrobe. Being an early riser, I can easily paint at least one on those days.

It was painted yesterday on our home balcony. There are days when I can‚Äôt make it to the studio..life happens..so I keep a painting kit at home in one of those big plastic storage containers from a hardware store. It fits nicely into a wardrobe. Being an early riser, I can easily paint at least one on those days.
author: Maaret Webb

title: Series 10 Progress
summary: Season 10‚Ä¶a few more done. Some friends are joining me this year and also painting every painting from Bobs tv series‚Ä¶all 403 of them
content: If anyone else is interested in doing this‚Ä¶here‚Äôs my two bob‚Äôs worth üòâ‚Ä¶I paint small, almost every day, and find a way to accept EVERYTHING. You improve and learn without even noticing, mistakes and failures are part of the deal, just like in life anyway. Twoinchbrush.com is the best source of all you need‚Ä¶all his paintings shown in thumbnails with colour lists and Bobs videos to paint along with. Feel free to pm me if you want more info..if I can‚Äôt help, I probably know someone else who can. Happy painting 2020!
author: Maaret Webb

title: The gift of Bob
summary: Know someone that would love the gift of Bob Ross this xmas?
content: Still looking for a Christmas gift for that special someone? üéÅ Our workshops are the perfect Christmas present! Learn how to paint beautiful landscapes from a certified Bob Ross instructor. Each workshop runs for 5 hours, in that time we will help you create your own stunning Bob Ross painting and learn the techniques needed to create more beautiful artwork. üí≤ Use the code FACEBOOK to receive 40% off! üí≤ Book now at: arthoughts.com
author: Maaret Webb

title: Series 10 Begins
summary: Started series 10‚Ä¶double digits‚Ä¶a happy little milestone!
content: However‚Ä¶having a major blah time today that even Bob couldn‚Äôt talk me out of‚Ä¶my painting was looking rather blah too, so of all the things that I could choose from, to turn my blah into a happy accident, I add a cabin‚Ä¶and I hate Bobs cabins!!!! Go figure hey? This is just so out of character that it‚Äôs tickling my funny bone and I‚Äôm feeling rather cheerful after all..I do like it when life grins and winks at me. The painting‚Äôs no better but I feel great üòÇ
author: Maaret Webb

title: A Little Inspiration
summary: I usually post only about Bob on this page but this fb post by Ryan Stephens is so spot on‚Ä¶a bit of gold to share with my students and it‚Äôs what Bob was about anyway‚Ä¶forget perfection and keep painting, and remember the most important thing is that it makes you feel happy! ALLOW YOURSELF TO BE HAPPY. ‚ù§Ô∏è
author: Maaret Webb

title: Imagination
summary: Imagination is one of the most important things you can possess. So develop your imagination‚Ä¶
content: It‚Äôs like any other muscle in the body..use it, exercise it, practise with it. You‚Äôll be amazed at what you can imagine. Pretty soon, if you paint, you become very aware of nature, you become aware of colour and you‚Äôre riding down the street and you see a beautiful tree and you say, Oh look at the sap green or the white in the cloud that‚Äôs made with a fan brush. You have to be careful though‚Ä¶you get so interested in all the beautiful things that nature has‚Ä¶you drive right off the road!‚Äù Bob Ross quote from series 9 episode 13
author: Maaret Webb

title: Another Great Workshop
summary: say ‚ÄúHappy Trees!‚Äù‚Ä¶
content: A lot of fun and happiness and hilarity today‚Ä¶happens when you put a fantastic bunch of women together‚Ä¶these ladies rocked it with their paintings..knew what they wanted and did their own versions of Bob‚Äôs very first seascape from series 1‚Ä¶so much fun. üí≤ Use the code FACEBOOK to receive 40% off! üí≤ Book now at: arthoughts.com

title: Another Great Day Teaching
summary: Another great day teaching‚Ä¶lovely results from all and lots of happy vibes. Class photo outside this time..Bob‚Äôs there in the background somewhere üòä

title: Check the results of this week's workshop
summary: Peep this preview for Next Week's Workshop
content: Will be teaching this at my next class. A quiet painting..Bob‚Äôs first seascape in the series from season 1‚Ä¶ The paint application for this one is nice and straightforward, but for a happy result, this painting asks for thoughtfulness about placement of the different elements that make up the composition‚Ä¶I found myself quieting down as I painted it..almost a meditation, a centering. Love this one. üíú
author: Maaret Webb

title: Check the results of this week's workshop
summary: Check the results of this week's workshop
content:
So thrilled with the results of today‚Äôs class. Am very grateful and in a bit of awe over how the technique delivers. Attitude helps and these gorgeous ladies have the best! Feeling on top of the world thanks to them üíú

If you want to learn to paint from a certified Bob Ross instructor as well, make sure to sign up! We hold workshops on the first three Saturdays of each month at our Studio in Brisbane.

Find our website here: Arthoughts
author: Maaret Webb

title: The Joy of Painting - Seascapes
summary: Working through season 9‚Ä¶used Bob‚Äôs newly arrived liquid clear today‚Ä¶very tricky, can‚Äôt picture students managing even the very thinnest coat. I‚Äôve used a substitute medium when I ran out of Bob‚Äôs product and found that it works brilliantly, much better than Bob‚Äôs. Still have plenty of time before I teach a seascape..thank goodness..I‚Äôll be churning them out before then‚Ä¶picture a seascape factory! That‚Äôs me. üíú
content:
Seascapes from series 1-9...going to focus on them for a while‚Ä¶feeling the need for it‚Ä¶to connect with their particular kind of mystery and beauty.

The heart of man is very much like the sea.

It has its storms,

it has its tides

and in its depths

it has its pearls too.‚Äù

Vincent Van Gogh
author: Maaret Webb

title: Scenes for Beginners
summary: These mountain themes are great for newbies to the method‚Ä¶they cover a nice range of techniques with Bob‚Äôs magic brushes‚Ä¶all you need to know to get painting along with him at home. üëçüòä
author: Maaret Webb

title: Season 8 Progress
summary: Series 8 so far. Discovered my next challenge - the colours in Bob‚Äôs foliage‚Ä¶
content: Bob makes use of a wide range of colour as he taps in highlights over an initial dark base for bushes and trees. BOB‚Ä¶‚ÄùAnd how about, how about we take some sap green and add a bit of cad yellow to it‚Ä¶and shoot let‚Äôs add some indian yellow and yellow ochre and maybe, maybe even a bit of bright red on the same ole dirty brush and the highlights‚Äôll just sparkle out onto those bushes in all kinds of beautiful colours.‚Äù ME‚Ä¶looks at muddy brown brush‚Ä¶üò©
author: Maaret Webb

title: Two Inch Brush
summary: Thought I‚Äôd share this wonderful link which I use all the time.
content: Two Inch Brush is a database listing all Bob Ross paintings from his tv series and has lots of other helpful info‚Ä¶eg a one hour tutorial. A really great feature is a small thumbnail of every painting‚Ä¶you click on it and it brings up the tv episode you want to watch and maybe paint along with or just listen to if you‚Äôre feeling stressed‚Ä¶there‚Äôs something very soothing about his voice.
author: Maaret Webb

title: Welcome to Arthoughts
summary: Follow us for updates from our Bob Ross painting workshops in Brisbane and on the Gold Coast
content: Welcome to the new Arthoughts blog. Here we‚Äôll keep you posted with abouts to our Bob Ross painting workshops, general painting info and photos of my progress recreating every single landscape painting from the Bob Ross PBS show ‚ÄòThe Joy of Painting‚Äô.
author: Maaret Webb
